Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
fat-free \fat-free\ adj. containing no fat; -- of foods. Opposite of {fat-containing}.
Syn: fatless, nonfat. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
fat-free adj : without fat or fat solids; "nonfat or fat-free milk" [syn: {nonfat}, {fatless}] [ant: {fatty}]
